title: visati visati
sahitya:
vishati vishati krSNa hE rAdhE rAdhE pravisha vinOda nikunja mantareyA


anupallavi

  dishi dishi varSita candrika dhavaLE dinakara kOTi sama makara kuNDaladhara
timirOdhita gandha sugana gamaya sharIra manamOhana
sahasra vraja vallava yuvati jana gaNa tEja manasija EkAnta narahari


caraNam 1    vamshidhara karatala shObhita mandasmita rucikara bhUSita
gOvardhana giridhara prabhAva gOvinda mukunda mAdhava
    caraNam 2    suramuni gaNa bhava haraNA sumanisaja nava vraja stuti vESa 
smarati sadA tava krti pari sampramA madhura madhura muralIdhara hari hari
